org.jerkar.api.crypto.pgp

Class JkPgp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.crypto.pgp.JkPgp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class JkPgp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Provides method for signing and verify signature with PGP.

    When constructing JkPgp, you can provide a secret key ring, a public key ring or both.
    Note that you need the secret ring for signing and the public ring for verifying.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Signs the specified files in a detached signature file which will have the same name of the signed file plus ".asc" suffix.
